    RELATED EVENTS

    Lorenzo Ghiberti (Italian, 1378–1455). Restored Figure of a Prophet in Niche, from Gates of Paradise, 1425–52. Gilt bronze. Collection of Museo dell'Opera del Duomo. Image courtesy Opificio delle Pietre Dure, Florence.

    All programs are free with museum admission unless otherwise noted. For more information, please call (312) 443-3680.

    FAMILY PROGRAMS
    Family Workshop: What a Relief! Renaissance Sculpture
    Kraft Education Center
    To register, call (312) 857-7161.

    October 6, 2:00–3:30 (ages 6–8 with an adult)
    October 13, 2:00–3:30 (ages 9 and up)

    Families will visit the exhibition and then return to the studio to experiment with clay and explore techniques for creating relief sculpture inspired by the work of Lorenzo Ghiberti.

    Drawing in the Galleries: Perspective
    Kraft Education Center
    To register, call (312) 857-7161.

    October 7, 11:30–1:00 (ages 9 and up)
    October 7 or 14, 2:00–3:30 (ages 6-8 with an adult)

    This class will investigate the use of perspective in the work of Lorenzo Ghiberti. Families will visit the exhibition and then explore a variety of ways to create perspective in their own drawings.


    TEACHER PROGRAM
    Renaissance Splendor: Lorenzo Ghiberti's Gates of Paradise
    Thursday, August 2, 1:00–4:00
    Fee: $30 (3 CPDUs)
    For more information, call (312) 443-9092. Click here to register.
